capabilities.title: 5-Axis CNC Machining
capabilities.description: Advanced 5-axis machining centers capable of producing complex geometries with superior surface finishes and tight tolerances in a single setup.

capabilities.title: Swiss Turning
capabilities.description: High-precision Swiss-type lathes for complex, small-diameter parts with exceptional surface finish and dimensional accuracy.

capabilities.title: Wire EDM
capabilities.description: Ultra-precision wire electrical discharge machining for intricate shapes, tight radii, and superior surface finishes on hardened materials.

capabilities.title: Coordinate Measuring
capabilities.description: State-of-the-art CMM systems with advanced probe technology for comprehensive dimensional verification and quality control.

capabilities.title: Surface Grinding
capabilities.description: Precision surface grinding capabilities for achieving superior flatness, parallelism, and surface finish requirements.

capabilities.title: Assembly Services
capabilities.description: Complete sub-assembly and final assembly services with comprehensive testing and quality verification protocols.
